Resources1×0.5×0.25×Rerun ); Post.getInitialProps = async function(context) { const { id } = context.query; const res = await fetch(`https://akabab.github.io/superhero-api/api/id/${id}.json`); console.log(res) const characters = await res.json(); console.log(`Fetched characters: ${characters.name}`); return { characters }; }; export default Post;
